briefTitle: Efficacy and Safety Study of Triptorelin 3-Month Formulation in Chinese Children With Central Precocious Puberty.
officialTitle: An Open-label, Multicentre, Single Arm Study to Assess the Efficacy and Safety of Triptorelin 3-month Formulation in Chinese Children With Central Precocious Puberty
summary: The purpose of this research was to confirm the effectiveness and safety of the study drug, Triptorelin pamoate 15mg 3-month formulation, in a Chinese population of Central Precocious Puberty (CPP) children.

primaryOutcome.measure: Percentage of Participants With Luteinising Hormone (LH) Suppression After Gonadotropin-Releasing Hormone (GnRH) Stimulation
